api_list.name: Get nhl news
api_list.description: get nhl news from a certain site
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nhlnews.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhlnews.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all nhl news
api_list.description: this end point will return all new about the nhl
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nhlnews.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhlnews.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
